name: Energy_Melee_Assassins_Strike
display_help: You can use Energy Melee to power your blows with pure energy. These focused power attacks often Disorient opponents. Barrage, Energy Punch and Bone Smasher all have a small chance of entering Energy Focus mode if used against a Disoriented foe. Total Focus will always enter Energy Focus mode. Barrage, Whirling Hands or Energy Transfer are empowered while under Energy Focus.
